These are simple cribnotes which I keep.

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(yingtools2)
html.files <- list.files(pattern="html$")
tbl <- tibble(link=html.files) %>% 
  mutate(label=gsub("\\.html$","",link),
         md=str_glue("[{label}]({link})")) %>%
  filter(link!="index.html")

toc <- paste(tbl$md,collapse="\n\n")

```

`r toc`
